histogram.name: DiskCache.0.Error
histogram.summary: Critical error ids. Reported each time the disk backed blockfile cache encounters an error or a critical error. Warning: this histogram was expired from Oct 2020 to Sep 2021; data may be missing.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TotalIOTimeRead
histogram.summary: The total time it takes to perform a read IO operation. This is emitted at each cache read, and measures from the IO thread to background thread, waiting for the disk read, and back to the IO thread.

histogram.name: DiskCache.0.TotalIOTimeWrite
histogram.summary: The total time it takes to perform a write IO operation. This is emitted at each cache read, and measures from the IO thread to background thread, optionally waiting for the disk write, and back to the IO thread.
